title: It’s More Enjoyable Together!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Setsuna-san, this novel is the original work that the anime is based on zura<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Waah! Thank you so much, Hanamaru-san! This is the anime’s DVD<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I think the anime is a cut-down version of the novel, so I’m looking forward to reading it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru is looking forward to see what kind of visual this novel turned into zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>The scene where the immortal protagonists got caught in an unexpected pinch is amazing....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Even reading that scene puts you on the edge of your seat! Does the old friend appear in the anime?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Do you mean the girl that the protagonist has lived with all of their life?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yes! Maru loves that girl the most, so Maru can’t help but wonder what kind of visual and what kind of voice she’ll have<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Don’t worry.... I’m sure she won’t betray your expectations, Hanamaru-san! I also want to watch it again now. Let’s watch it together after this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
